channel.title: Socks in Appvm connected to sys-whonix
channel.description:
Hi I want to set a socks 5 in a connection setting of an AppVm connected to sys-whonix. Do I have change something in sys-whonix? In connection setting there is "Proxy DNS when using socks v5, can I check it?
K. Regards

item.title: Socks in Appvm connected to sys-whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Yes, otherwise chances are higher DNS would leak. (Only go through Tor and not through the proxy.)

Read full topic
item.source: Socks in Appvm connected to sys-whonix

item.title: Socks in Appvm connected to sys-whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
evjd4n0p:

Do I have change something in sys-whonix?

No.

Make sure to read:

Whonix

Tunnels/Introduction

Instructions on how to combine tunnels (VPN, SSH, proxy) with Tor. (User -> Tor -> proxy/VPN/SSH -> Internet) (User -> proxy/VPN/SSH ->...

and related pages.

Read full topic
item.source: Socks in Appvm connected to sys-whonix
